sentences.english: Judges 5 is also another ancient song fragment in verses four to five.
sentences.chinese: 士师记》5中也有古老歌谣的片段，诗4和。

sentences.english: The labor song is the oldest ballad directly originating from physical labor.
sentences.chinese: 劳动歌是由体力劳动直接激发起来的最古老的歌谣。

sentences.english: The children will sing English songs and chants.
sentences.chinese: 我们还要为大家唱最动听的英语歌谣。

sentences.english: Simple analysis also the decaying Reason of Chaoshan songs.
sentences.chinese: 同时简单分析潮汕歌谣日渐衰微的原因。

sentences.english: There are specific cultural values in Bouyei's funeral ballad of Luoping County.
sentences.chinese: 罗平布依族丧葬歌谣具有特定的文化价值。

sentences.english: Songs burst from my breast, all my crying stops, mistory fills the air.
sentences.chinese: 歌谣声起，哭泣停止，对世界懵然未知。

sentences.english: I wash my hair in the green waves and raise my voice in a lonely song.
sentences.chinese: 绿波梳洗我的发际，放声唱起一首孤独的歌谣。

sentences.english: On grey mornings of rain I have crooned many an idle song.
sentences.chinese: 在细雨霏霏的清晨，我吟唱过许多闲散的歌谣。

sentences.english: Ryu Murakami is the author of “Popular Hits of the Showa Era.”
sentences.chinese: 村上龙是《昭和歌谣大全》的作者。

sentences.english: In summer I sing the song.
Singing the Sky's song, clouds and water take away all dreams of the river.
sentences.chinese: 云水和着天空的歌谣，把河流的梦想全部带走。

sentences.english: A kind of secret song is born of this indifference.
sentences.chinese: 从这淡漠中似乎滋生了一种隐秘的歌谣。

sentences.english: And the songs of every poet past and forever.
sentences.chinese: 还有每一个诗人们的歌谣也已成为过去与永恒。

sentences.english: People in Henan have created a lot of political ballads.
sentences.chinese: 身处天子脚下的河南人创作了大量的时政歌谣。

sentences.english: Chapter three examines all sorts of relations between revolutionary songs of Hong'an and regional culture.
sentences.chinese: 第三章研究红安革命歌谣与地域文化之间的种种关系。

sentences.english: The first chapter traces the emergence of "Folklore Movement" to its incorporation into Chinese Studies.
sentences.chinese: 首章论述歌谣运动从发起征集到并入国学的基本脉络。

definition: singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
xiaodiao, a Chinese folk song genre/minor key (in music)
